columns.name: spotify_track_uri
columns.meaning: Spotify URI that uniquely identifies each track in the form of "spotify:track:<base-62 string>"

columns.name: ts
columns.meaning: Timestamp indicating when the track stopped playing in UTC (Coordinated Universal Time)

columns.name: platform
columns.meaning: Platform used when streaming the track.

columns.name: ms_played
columns.meaning: Number of milliseconds the stream was played.

columns.name: track_name
columns.meaning: The name of the musical track being played.

columns.name: artist_name
columns.meaning: The name of the artist who performed the track.

columns.name: album_name
columns.meaning: The name of the album to which the track belongs.

columns.name: reason_start
columns.meaning: Why the track started. E.g., fwdbtn, packbtn, trackdone, clickrow, appload...
columns.null_value_rule: allowed empty string '' for missing data

columns.name: reason_end
columns.meaning: Why the track ended. E.g., fwdbtn, packbtn, trackdone, clickrow, appload...
columns.null_value_rule: allowed empty string '' for missing data

columns.name: shuffle
columns.meaning: A boolean flag indicating whether the track was played as part of a shuffled playlist.

columns.name: skipped
columns.meaning: A boolean flag indicating whether the track was skipped by the user.
